t: Everware International | LinkedIn
s: Everware International | 46 followers on LinkedIn. Everware International was founded in 2010 by Henry Liu, the owner of one of the largest kitchenware manufacturers in China, Henry Foodservice. Henry immigrated to America and created a variety of brands which operate under Everware International.
